Sentence.sentence: The British traveler Charles Thompson spoke for many Grand Tourists when in 1744 he described himself as being impatiently desirous of viewing a country so famous in history, a country which once gave laws to the world, and which is at present the greatest school of music and painting, contains the noblest productions of sculpture and architecture, and is filled with cabinets of rarities, and collections of all kinds of historical relics.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The mud contains the same critical nutrients.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As a report in The New England Journal of Medicine concluded, Pretty much every proposed innovation found in the health policy literature these days is contained in these measures.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Viewed from scientists’ standpoint, allthe energy contained in fuel either now or in the future becomes heat.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: L) The college admission essay contains the grandest American themes―status anxiety, parental piety (孝顺), intellectual standards—and so it is only a matter of time before it becomes infected by the country's culture of excessive concern with self-esteem.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Stored underground in large salt caves in Louisiana, this stockpile is called the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and currently contains over 600 million barrels of oil, roughly equivalent to one month's supply.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But schools rarely dig down to find out what really makes an applicant succeed, to create a class which also contains diversity of attitude and approach – arguably the only diversity that, in a business context, really matters.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Some brand-name coffees contain harmful substances.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Better skip dinner or hit the gym afterwards, with a cancer charity warning that some iced coffees contain as many calories as a hot dinner
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Other iced coffees contained more than 450 calories and the majority had an excess of 200.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But it's said to no longer contain kola nut extract, relying instead on artificial imitations to achieve the flavour.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In West Africa, people have long chewed kola nuts as stimulants, because they contain caffeine that also occurs naturally in tea, coffee, and chocolate.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Provided you have not cheated by consulting an atlas, you will notice something rather surprising— the two lists will contain roughly the same number of states, but they will not be identical.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Saturated fats are fats that are found principally in meat and dairy products, although some nuts and vegetable oils also contain them.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Some contain live experimentation, but not always.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The company boasts that its dried crickets contain more protein than beef, chicken, and pork, as well as minerals like iron and calcium.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The developing brain, the report says, is particularly vulnerable to the toxic effects of certain chemicals these products may contain, and the damage they cause can be  permanent.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: There are no public databases that contain millions of faces.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: While it may be impossible to prevent kids from drinking tap water that may contain trace amounts of chemicals, keeping kids away from lawns recently sprayed with chemicals and freshly dry-cleaned clothes can't hurt.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"包括，包含"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: contain, include, embrace, involve, comprehend, hold, comprise
means: contain ： 普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
include ： 普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
embrace ： 正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
involve ： 把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。
comprehend ： 正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
hold ： 常和contain换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
comprise ： 书面用词，暗指一个整体包括不同部分所组成，可与include交换使用。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

entry.def: If something such as a box, bag, room, or place contains things, those things are inside it.

example.ex: The bag contained a Christmas card...
example.tran: 这个包里装着一张圣诞卡。

example.ex: Factory shops contain a wide range of cheap furnishings...
example.tran: 工厂车间里陈设着种类繁多的廉价家具。

entry.def: If a substance contains something, that thing is a part of it.

example.ex: Greek yogurt contains much less fat than double cream...
example.tran: 希腊酸奶比高脂浓奶油所含脂肪要少得多。

example.ex: Many cars run on petrol which contains lead.

entry.def: If writing, speech, or film contains particular information, ideas, or images, it includes them.
entry.tran: (著作、讲话或电影中)包括，包含

example.ex: This sheet contained a list of problems a patient might like to raise with the doctor...
example.tran: 这张单子列出了病人可能会向医生提出的一系列问题。

example.ex: The two discs also contain two of Britten's lesser-known song-cycles.
example.tran: 这两张唱片还包含了布里顿两首不甚知名的声乐套曲。

entry.def: If a group or organization contains a certain number of people, those are the people that are in it.

example.ex: The committee contains 11 Democrats and nine Republicans.
example.tran: 这个委员会包括11名民主党人和9名共和党人。

entry.def: If you contain something, you control it and prevent it from spreading or increasing.

example.ex: More than a hundred firemen are still trying to contain the fire at the plant...
example.tran: 上百名消防队员仍在试图控制工厂的火势。

example.ex: The city authorities said the curfew had contained the violence.
example.tran: 市政府称宵禁遏制住了暴力事件。

entry.def: If you cannot contain a feeling such as excitement or anger, or if you cannot contain yourself, you cannot prevent yourself from showing your feelings.

example.ex: But he was bursting with curiosity, and one day he just couldn't contain himself. 'What are you going to do?' he asked...
example.tran: 但他满心好奇，一天，他真的忍不住了。“你打算做什么？”他问道。

example.ex: Evans could barely contain his delight: 'I'm so proud of her,' he said.
example.tran: 埃文斯喜不自禁：“我真为她骄傲。”他说。

means.word_mean: 1. include or contain; have as a component;

sentences.sentence: "A totally new idea is comprised in this paper"
"The record contains many old songs from the 1930's"

means.word_mean: 3. lessen the intensity of; temper; hold in restraint; hold or keep within limits;
5. be capable of holding or containing;

sentences.sentence: "This box won't take all the items"

means.word_mean: 6. hold back, as of a danger or an enemy; check the expansion or influence of;

sentences.sentence: "Check the growth of communism in Sout East Asia"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French contenir, from Latin continere, from con- 'altogether' + tenere 'to hold'
